column5: The vacation rental you have been searching for! With a hot tub, pool, dry sauna, fitness facility, plus TONS of amenities, and only one block from the beach, this newly renovated 2 bedroom, 2 bath, 915 square ft. condo is perfect for your next beach getaway!  My place is close to the beach, restaurants and dining, offers a great view of the water, and has family-friendly activities on site.
